thread.title: Police search Colchester business for alleged prostitution
thread.title_full: Police search Colchester business for alleged prostitution - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: Keith McGilvery
title: Police search Colchester business for alleged prostitution
text:
COLCHESTER, Vt. - Possible prostitution led police to a Colchester business Monday afternoon.
Colchester authorities say they are investigating the alleged criminal behavior at the King Spa on Porters Point Road. Police used a search warrant to search the property with help from Homeland Security. They say that they are also looking at potential human trafficking as part of the investigation.
"We -- as part of obtaining information for the warrant -- did some surveillance here and did obtain some surveillance here that allowed us to obtain the warrant," said Colchester Police Dept. Lt. Doug Allen.
Colchester Police tell Channel 3 there were three people inside the spa when they arrived. No word yet on possible arrests or charges.
